channel.title: Batman Universe Podcast
channel.description: This is all about The Batman Universe. This podcast includes Movie News, Comic News, TV News, Book News, and any other news relating to the Batman Universe. The characters that we discuss are Batman, Robin, Nightwing, Batgirl, Birds of Prey, Azrael, Huntress, Black Canary, Oracle, and the entire Rogues Gallery.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Everything Batman
channel.itunes:author: Dustin
channel.itunes:summary: This is all about The Batman Universe. This podcast includes Movie News, Comic News, TV News, Book News, and any other news relating to the Batman Universe. item.title: Change Over Announcement
item.description:
We haved moved to a dedicated site. We will be giving you a daily dose of info on all things related to Batman and will also have the podcast being hosted through there. The new links for everything are as follows:
New Site- www.thebatmanuniverse.net New Comic Cast Link- http://www.thebatmanuniverse.net/podcast/thebatmanuniversecomicpodcast.php New Normal Cast Link- http://www.thebatmanuniverse.net/podcast/thebatmanuniversepodcast.php
item.dc:creator: Dustin
